document.full_text: actress kate winslet will author a book of celebrity self-portrait photos by ben stiller, jude law, meryl streep and others to support autism that will be released later this year, publisher simon & schuster said thursday.
document.title: kate winslet authors celebrity book for autism
lines_and_colors: actress kate winslet will author a book of celebrity self-portrait photos by ben stiller, jude law, meryl streep and others to support autism that will be released later this year, publisher simon & schuster said thursday.
